en-US.title: Notifications
en-US.subtitle: Notifications - Send Push, SMS, or Email Notifications or Messages to Application Users or Email Messages to Directus Users
en-US.description: Send Push, SMS, or Email Notifications or Messages to Application Users or Email Messages to Directus Users
en-US.introduction:
You can send Push, SMS, or Email Notifications or Messages to Application Users.
You can also send Email Messages to other Directus Users.
To begin select the Module in the Menu!

sms.label: SMS
sms.description: Send Message via Mobile Phone SMS

app.headline: Send Notification or Message
description: To get started, select the mode(s) of notification.
By default, notifications are sent to all active users or active applications (push notifications only)!
SMS Notifications require a subscription to an SMS API such as Twilio Programmable SMS.
To send to a select users, please choose from the users displayed (useful for testing).
NOTE: When sending notifications as PUSH or SMS, pay attention to the length of the message!

directus.headline: Send Email Message
description: To get started, select the mode(s) of notification.
By default, email messages are sent to all active admin users!
To send to a select users, please choose from the users displayed (useful for testing).

You DO NOT need to enter the greeting - all messages are prefixed with:
'Hello {{ user.first_name }} {{ user.last_name }}'!

You DO NOT need to enter the salutation - all messages are annexed with:
'Love,
{{ settings.project_name }} — {{ settings.project_tagline }}'!

message.placeholder: Enter Message - Raw HTML or Plaintext - Required!
